title: 122nd Infantry Division (Wehrmacht)
text: The 122nd <a href="Infantry">Infantry</a> Division (German: "122. Infanterie-Division") was a <a href="Nazi%20Germany">German</a> <a href="division%20%28military%29">division</a> in <a href="World%20War%20II">World War II</a>. It was formed on 5 October 1940
